name: Fear Protocol: Shadow Paradigm
description:
It's another nice dark day in Escondido, California and special agent Jack Banger goes from out of the frying pan and into the fire. The disgusting biomonster creatures are continuing to terrorize the city and there's only so much time before the plague spreads across the nation. The Night Striker Squad is all dead and now it's up to Banger to solve the biomonster crisis. Now, only one question remains...

How to exterminate the biomonster threat?

GENRE
Tactical Espionage Thriller Mystery Box

GAME INFO
Become Jack Banger and make difficult choices, such as who lives and who dies. Master your arsenal of 5 weapons, and keep a keen eye out for mystical items such as crispy mushrooms.

PROS
 Is Short
 High Octance Action
 Dynamic Music System

CONS
 Is better than Banger 1
 Defies Genre Stereotypes
 Risotto
